## About the project

This project extracts COVID-19 data from OurWorldInData.org and forecasts total confirmed cases and total deaths for the next 20 days using DRC (Dose-response-curve) logistic model.

The data is downloaded from this location

  <https://covid.ourworldindata.org/data/owid-covid-data.csv>

And a description of the files can be found here

  <https://github.com/owid/covid-19-data/tree/master/public/data>

## Files

These files are part of the project:

**Covid 19 Peru.R** the R script which run the statistics

**owid-covid-data.csv** the data set which is downloaded from OurWorldInData.org

**Covid19.Rmd** the markdown which generates the results in HTML format
